description: This file defines a UI component named 'NotesList' using Lightning SDK's Blits framework. It handles displaying a list of notes, including headers, add and delete functionalities, and subscription to external note data. It imports themes, services, and external components, and manages internal state, event handling, and rendering templates.

methods.name: $itemTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of a note or 'Untitled' if not available.

methods.name: $itemUpdated
methods.description: Returns formatted last updated date of a note.

methods.name: $rowColor
methods.description: Determines the background color of a note row based on selection.

methods.name: $itemY
methods.description: Calculates vertical position of a note in the list.

methods.name: $trashColor
methods.description: Determines the background color of the delete button on hover.

methods.name: $onTrashHover
methods.description: Handles hover state for trash icon.

methods.name: $onTrashLeave
methods.description: Resets hover state for trash icon.

methods.name: $onAddHover
methods.description: Handles hover state for add button.

methods.name: $onAddLeave
methods.description: Resets hover state for add button.

methods.name: $emitSelect
methods.description: Emits selection change and updates internal selectedId state.

methods.name: $select
methods.description: Triggers selection of a note by ID.

methods.name: $handleNew
methods.description: Creates a new note and sets it as selected.

methods.name: $remove
methods.description: Removes a note after confirmation and updates selection.
